symbiota-spatial.point-tools-tab.no_poin: There are no points loaded on the map.
symbiota-spatial.vector-tools-tab.differ: Returns a new polygon with the area of the polygon or circle selected first, excluding the area of the polygon or circle selected second.
symbiota-spatial.vector-tools-tab.inters: Returns a new polygon with the area overlapping of both selected polygons or circles.
symbiota-spatial.vector-tools-tab.union_: Returns a new polygon with the combined area of two or more selected polygons or circles. *Note new polygon will replace all selected shapes.
